entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: E 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
